name: Bacon-Mushroom Burger
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons chopped white mushrooms
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the bacon over medium heat in a skillet until cooked but not crispy. Drain on paper towels and when cool enough to handle, tear or chop into small pieces.
Combine the beef, bacon, onion, mushrooms, and salt and pepper in a large bowl. Using your hands, mix well. Form into 6 patties. Refrigerate until ready to grill.
Prepare a charcoal or gas grill: Lightly spray the grill rack with vegetable oil cooking spray. Light the coals or heating elements, and let them burn or heat until hot.
Grill the burgers for about 5 minutes. Turn and grill for 4 to 5 minutes longer for medium-well burgers.
